extendedInfo.description: Did you ever wanted to share a text with your favorite app? But your favorite app is not listed in the "Share via" menu?Than this app is the perfect solution for you!This app will add itself to the "Share via" menu for texts and copy the text to the clipboard. So now you can paste the text by long clicking an input box to your favorite app.Enjoy!Note: This pro version is adfree.PS: This is no lunchable app
